original_title: Mary Pickford: The Muse of the Movies
overview: This documentary traces the life and work of the legendary "America's Sweetheart" Mary Pickford, silent film star, movie pioneer and keen businesswoman. Pickford's life also parallels an even larger story, telling of the birth of the cinema itself.
tagline: Illuminates the life of "America's Sweetheart", film pioneer, actress and keen business woman Mary Pickford
title: Mary Pickford: The Muse of the Movies
